      • RobotArray

        public RobotArray(int robotsNumber,
                  RobotTracker rt,
                  ImageGraph ig)
        a constructor
        Parameters:
        robotsNumber - the number of robots to allocate
        rt - reference to the RobotTracker instance
        ig - reference to the ImageGraph instance from previous stage

    • Method Detail

      • findRobotsInImage

        public RobotPositions findRobotsInImage(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat image,
                                        double topAndBotLineRatio)
        finds robots in a frame, updates their positions in the Robot classes and places it on the ImageGraph
        Parameters:
        image - the image to search for robots in
        topAndBotLineRatio - the camera angle used to shift the square center down
        Returns:
        an object containing the results - the Rects of the Robots, their centers shifted downwards and their positions in the ImageGraph

      • printAllRobotPositions

        public void printAllRobotPositions()
        print last known positions of all robots

      • printAllRobotHistories

        public void printAllRobotHistories()
        print the history of all robots
